body.bibl: Behr, John. “St Isaac of Nineveh on the Cross of Christ.” In Saint Isaac the Syrian and His Spiritual Legacy: Proceedings from the International Patristics Conference, Held at the Sts Cyril and Methodius Institute for Postgraduate Studies Moscow, October 10-11, 2013, edited by Hilarion Alfeyev, 87–96.
